alfredsnippet.snippet:
Lord Kelvin's unfortunate claims:

"Radio has no future."

"Wireless [telegraphy] is all very well but I'd rather send a message by a boy on a pony!"

"X rays are a hoax."

"Aircraft flight is impossible."

Most well known of all is what he said at the British Association for the advancement of Science in 1900:

"There is nothing new to be discovered in physics now. All that remains is more and more precise measurement."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Lord Kelvin's Unfortunate Claims
